treatment-md.title: Aphelinoidea (Aphelinoidea) sariq Rakitov & Triapitsyn, 2013, sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: Egg parasitoids (Hymenoptera: Mymaridae and Trichogrammatidae) of the gall-making leafhopper Scenergates viridis (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) from Uzbekistan, with taxonomic notes on the Palaearctic species of Aphelinoidea
